meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1781.

td.p: Chris Montplaisir, a senior from the University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill
Ken Kansa, a junior from George Washington University
Margaret Bickers, a freshman from Agnes Scott College

tr.td: U.S. CITIES
DISNEY WORLD
SAINTS
MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS
AD LINES
2-LETTER WORDS

tr.td: Margaret

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: And for the first time ever in any of our tournaments we have a tie and we must go to a tiebreaker clue, a tiebreaker answer. So, players pick up your signaling buttons, please. And since this is the only tournament we have ever done this, there is one important rule of which you should be aware and that is the fact you cannot win by default. You must give a correct response. The tiebreaker category for today is... AMERICAN AUTHORS. Here is the clue for you...)
ChrisWhat are the Pentagon Papers
$5,000
MargaretWhat are ???
$2,000
KenWhat are the Pentagon Papers?
$1,000
Pentagon Papers')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'These documents revealed the Truman admin. gave military aid to France in its war against the Viet Minh')

tr.td: THE 1970s
These documents revealed the Truman admin. gave military aid to France in its war against the Viet Minh

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_TB', 'clue_TB_stuck', 'His first novel was "The Torrents of Spring", but most know his next, "The Sun Also Rises"')

tr.td: AMERICAN AUTHORS
His first novel was "The Torrents of Spring", but most know his next, "The Sun Also Rises"
Margaret
Ken
Chris
3rd place: $1000 if eliminated
2nd place: $1000 if eliminated
Automatic semifinalist
Margaret
Ken
Chris

22 R
(including 2 DDs),
1 W
